thought: The website is accessible. Now I need to extract the text in the HTML to look for any signs of a scam.
observation: Global Equity Management  200 Bellevue Parkway, Suite 220, Wilmington, DE (302) 573-3570 info@mpainc.com Menu Home Podcast History Team Products Global Opportunities Strategy Southeast Asia Strategy U.S. Equities Strategy Endowment Strategy Philosophy Content Check Out Our Latest Content Here is our new podcast, Market Moments (with the Marvins). LISTEN HERE Experienced Global Investors Our team has been through countless market cycles, all across the globe. See Our Products Global Thematic Investing Learn About Our Philosophy At Marvin & Palmer, we serve our clients with the combination of decades of global investment experience, a disciplined and repeatable process, and dedicated risk management. Our Strategies Learn more U.S. Equities Meet Our Investment Team David Marvin Chairman of the Board, Portfolio Manager Mr. Marvin is a member of the Management Committee. Together with Stan Palmer, he founded the firm in July 1986. Prior to starting Marvin & Palmer Associates, Mr. Marvin served for ten years as Vice President in charge of the $10 billion internally-managed DuPont Pension Fund. Preceding his employment at DuPont, he worked for Investors Diversified Services as the Head Portfolio Manager for the IDS Stock Fund, the largest equity mutual fund in the United States at the time of his tenure. He started in the investment business in 1965 as a securities analyst for Chicago Title & Trust. Mr. Marvin earned his M.B.A. from Northwestern University and B.S. from the University of Illinois. He is a CFA charterholder and a member of the CFA Institute. Todd Marvin President, Portfolio Manager Mr. Marvin is a member of the Management Committee. He began with the firm as an International Analyst in 1991 and became a Portfolio Manager in 1993. Prior to joining the firm, he worked for Oppenheimer & Company as an analyst in investment banking. Mr. Marvin earned his B.A. from Wesleyan University. He is a CFA charterholder, a member of the CFA Institute and a member of the CFA Society of Philadelphia. Stephen Marvin Mr. Marvin joined the firm in 1994 as a Global Analyst and became a Portfolio Manager in 1997. Prior to joining the firm, he worked for Bear, Stearns & Company as a Corporate Finance Analyst. Mr. Marvin earned his B.A. from Carleton College. He is a Financial Risk Manager (FRM) â€“ Certified by the Global Association of Risk Professionals. Jay Middleton Portfolio Manager Mr. Middleton joined the firm in 1989 as a Global Analyst and became a Portfolio Manager in 1992. Mr. Middleton earned his B.A. from Wesleyan University. He is a member of the Phi Beta Kappa Honor Society. Backgrounds Want to Learn More? Contact Us Office: 19809 Check the background of your financial professional on FINRA's BrokerCheck The content is developed from sources believed to be providing accurate information.
